title: Welcome to Hell
description: Charlie greets you warmly.

title: Charlie's Unwavering Support
description: Charlie: 'I believe in you more than anyone.'

choices.text: And I believe in your dream.

outcomes.narrativeText: Tears of joy stream down her face.

title: Charlie's Disappointment
description: Charlie stands before you, disappointed: 'I thought you were better than this.'

title: Alastor's Genuine Interest
description: Alastor: 'You amuse me. Shall we collaborate?'

title: Alastor's Broadcast Threat
description: Alastor: 'Everyone will hear what you've done.'

outcomes.narrativeText: You stand firm. Alastor smiles darkly.
You surrender leverage to silence him.

title: Vaggie's Complete Trust
description: Vaggie: 'I would stand beside you against anyone.'

choices.text: And I'll always protect what you love.

title: Vaggie's Suspicion
description: Vaggie blocks your path: 'You're with THEM, aren't you?'

outcomes.narrativeText: She doesn't believe you, but holds back.
Vaggie's eyes narrow but she steps aside.

title: Angel Dust's True Self
description: Angel: 'With you, I don't have to put on an act.'

choices.text: I cherish who you really are.

outcomes.narrativeText: Angel leans into you, safe and loved.

title: Angel Dust's Cold Shoulder
description: Angel: 'You're just like everyone else.'

outcomes.narrativeText: Angel watches you go, his heart hardening.

title: Husk's Rare Compliment
description: Husk: 'You're not a complete idiot.'

choices.text: Coming from you, that means a lot.

title: Husk's Grim Prophecy
description: Husk: 'You're gonna end up just like me. Soulless.'

title: Niffty's Twisted Adoration
description: Niffty: 'You're the COOLEST person I've ever met!'

title: Niffty's Manic Disappointment
description: Niffty: 'You broke my heart! NOBODY breaks Niffty's heart!'

title: Vox Makes You a Star
description: Vox: 'Your story will reach every screen in Hell.'

outcomes.narrativeText: Vox broadcasts your rise to glory.

title: Vox Broadcasts Your Shame
description: Vox: 'Let's show Hell who you REALLY are.'

title: Valentino's Lucrative Offer
description: Valentino: 'Work with me, and you'll have everything.'

outcomes.narrativeText: You've sold a piece of your soul.
Valentino's smile doesn't waver, but his eyes go cold.

title: Valentino's Wrathful Pursuit
description: Valentino: 'Nobody crosses me without consequences.'

outcomes.narrativeText: You escape, but wounded and hunted.

title: Velvette Makes You Trendy
description: Velvette: 'You're about to be the hottest trend in Hell.'

outcomes.narrativeText: Velvette's social media elevates you instantly.
You're now in her inner circle.

title: Velvette's Public Humiliation
description: Velvette: 'Time to cancel you.'

title: Rosie's Exclusive Circle
description: Rosie: 'You'd be honored in my inner circle, darling.'

outcomes.narrativeText: You're now part of Rosie's elite.

title: Rosie Cuts You Out
description: Rosie: 'I'm afraid we're no longer welcome company, dear.'

outcomes.narrativeText: Rosie's coldness cuts deeper than any blade.
You leave with your dignity intact.

title: Carmilla's Powerful Alliance
description: Carmilla: 'My family extends protection to you.'

outcomes.narrativeText: You're now part of her family's circle.

title: Carmilla's Wrathful Judgment
description: Carmilla: 'You threatened my family. You're finished.'

choices.text: I didn't know it would hurt them.
I did what I had to.

outcomes.narrativeText: Carmilla considers you worthy of respect.

title: Lucifer's Recognition
description: Lucifer: 'You have potential. Perhaps overlord material.'

outcomes.narrativeText: Lucifer smiles, a rare and terrifying sight.

title: Lucifer's Royal Disdain
description: Lucifer: 'You are beneath my notice.'

outcomes.narrativeText: You're forever marked as a coward.

title: Pentagram Market Bustles
description: The markets buzz with demonic activity and opportunities.

title: Underground Fighting Pits
description: Illegal tournaments test demonic power.

title: Ancient Hellish Artifact Found
description: An artifact of immense power hidden in Hell's depths.

title: Lost Souls Need Guidance
description: Desperate sinners seek salvation guidance.

outcomes.narrativeText: You become a beacon of hope.

title: Territorial Dispute Erupts
description: Two demon factions clash over territory.

title: Power Surge Within
description: Your inner power suddenly spikes uncontrollably.

title: Breakthrough Realization
description: A sudden understanding transforms your perspective.

outcomes.narrativeText: You stop fighting what you are.

title: Ancient Entity's Offer
description: Something from time immemorial offers immense power.

outcomes.narrativeText: You've made a deal with something ancient.

title: Unexpected Ally Emerges
description: Someone unexpected offers aid when you need it most.

outcomes.narrativeText: New alliances form from unlikely places.

title: Trusted Ally Betrays You
description: Someone you trusted reveals their true intentions.

outcomes.narrativeText: Trust is shattered but not destroyed.

title: Shared Secret Bonds You
description: Someone shares their deepest secret with you.

title: Your Authority Challenged
description: 'Who do you think you are to lead?'

title: District Expansion Opportunity
description: An entire district could be yours with the right moves.

outcomes.narrativeText: A new domain is yours to rule.

title: An Old Curse Returns
description: Something you thought forgotten comes back to haunt you.

title: An Angel Appears
description: Celestial light cuts through Hell's darkness.

outcomes.narrativeText: A message from heaven reaches you.

title: The Final Reckoning
description: Everything has led to this moment. Redemption or Damnation.

title: Lost Souls Need Guidance
description: Desperate sinners seek salvation guidance.

outcomes.narrativeText: You illuminate their path, however dim.
They cling to you, unaware of your intentions.

title: Imp Riot in the Streets
description: Imps have formed a violent mob, demanding 'better torture options.'

outcomes.narrativeText: The imps scatter, terrified of your authority.
The imps surprisingly appreciate your attention.

title: The Helltrain Arrives
description: A demonic locomotive arrives with unusual cargo.

outcomes.narrativeText: You uncover occult materials of unknown origin.
The conductor looks the other way.

title: Overlord Summit Invitation
description: You've been invited to a rare gathering of Hell's overlords.

outcomes.narrativeText: You gain insight into Hell's political landscape.
Your absence raises eyebrows, but asserts independence.

title: Hellquake Tremors
description: A violent quake shakes the foundations of Hell.

choices.text: Use the chaos to expand your territory.

outcomes.narrativeText: In the dust and ruin, you claim new ground.

title: Malfunctioning Hell Portal
description: A teleportation portal glitches violently, spitting out anomalies.

outcomes.narrativeText: You bring order to chaotic magic.

choices.text: Use the instability for arcane research.

outcomes.narrativeText: The portal's madness becomes your advantage.

title: A Sinful Celebrity Requests You
description: A notorious Hell celebrity wants you in their newest scandal.

outcomes.narrativeText: Your fame skyrockets—for better or worse.
Your restraint earns quiet respect from some.

title: Forbidden Archives of the Underworld
description: The library opens once a century, filled with cursed knowledge.

title: A Demon Heir Seeks Mentorship
description: A young noble demon wants you to be their mentor.

outcomes.narrativeText: Your guidance shapes a future power.

title: Soul Auction at the Market
description: A rare auction of high-value souls begins.

outcomes.narrativeText: You obtain a soul pulsing with potential.
You learn who's buying what—and why.
